analyzed: thera vāda vinaya
bhikkhuni vibhaṅga
saṅgha ādi sesa kaṇḍa
eka gāma antara gamana sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyā antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā gāmakaṁ ñātikulaṁ agamāsi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyāḥ antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhim bhaṇḍitvā gāmakam ñāti kulam agamāsi

original: Bhaddā kāpilānī taṁ bhikkhuniṁ apassantī bhikkhuniyo pucchi—“kahaṁ itthannāmā, na dissatī”ti.
analyzed: bhaddā kāpilānī tam bhikkhunim a passantī bhikkhuniyo pucchika ham itthannāmā na dissati iti
bhikkhunīhi saddhi ayye bhaṇḍitvā na dissati iti

original: “Ammā, amukasmiṁ gāmake etissā ñātikulaṁ. Tattha gantvā vicinathā”ti.
analyzed: ammā amukasmin gāmake etissā ñāti kula tattha gantvā vicinatha ati

original: Bhikkhuniyo tattha gantvā taṁ bhikkhuniṁ passitvā etadavocuṁ—“kissa tvaṁ, ayye, ekikā āgatā, kaccisi appadhaṁsitā”ti?
analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ tattha gantvā tam bhikkhunim passitvā etat avocuḥ kissa tva ayye ekikā āgatā kaccisi appadhasitā ati
appadhasitā amhi ayyā iti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaram gacchissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṁ gacchatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaram gacchati iti
sat ca bhagavān ati
vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṁ gacchissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaram gacchissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṁ gaccheyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṁ dhammaṁ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṁ saṅghādisesan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaram gaccheyya ayam pi bhikkhunī paṭhama āpattikam dhammam āpannā nissāraṇīyam saṅgha ādisesam ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhunīnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo sāketā sāvatthiṁ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyaḥ sāketā sāvatthim addhāna magga ppaṭipannāḥ honti

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo nāvike upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṁ—“sādhu no, āvuso, tārethā”ti.
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ nāvike upasaṅkamitvā etat avocuḥ sādhu naḥ āvuso tāretha ati
nāyye sakkau ubho sakim tāretunti

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā nadīpāraṁ gacchatī”ti?

sat ca bhagavān ati

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā nadīpāraṁ gacchissati.

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṁ gaccheyya, ekā vā nadīpāraṁ gaccheyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṁ dhammaṁ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṁ saṅghādisesan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaram gaccheyya ekā vā nadī pāram gaccheyya ayam pi bhikkhunī paṭhama āpattikam dhammam āpannā nissāraṇīyam saṅgha ādisesam ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhunīnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṁ gacchantā sāyaṁ aññataraṁ gāmaṁ upagacchiṁsu.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ kosalesu janapade sāvatthim gacchantā sāyam aññataram gāmam upagacchisu

original: Tattha aññatarā bhikkhunī abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā. Aññataro puriso tassā bhikkhuniyā saha dassanena paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
analyzed: tattha aññatarā bhikkhunī abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā aññataraḥ puriso tassā bhikkhuniyā saha dassanena paṭibaddha cittaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho so puriso tāsaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ seyyaṁ paññapento tassā bhikkhuniyā seyyaṁ ekamantaṁ paññāpesi.
analyzed: atha kho so purisaḥ tāsam bhikkhunīnam seyyam paññapento tassā bhikkhuniyā seyyam ekamantam paññāpesi

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī sallakkhetvā—“pariyuṭṭhito ayaṁ puriso; sace rattiṁ āgacchissati, vissaro me bhavissatī”ti,
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī sallakkhetvā a pariyuṭṭhitaḥ ayam puriso sace rattim āgacchissati vissaraḥ me bhavissati iti

original: bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā aññataraṁ kulaṁ gantvā seyyaṁ kappesi.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyo an āpucchāḥ aññataram kulam gantvā seyyam kappesi

original: Atha kho so puriso rattiṁ āgantvā taṁ bhikkhuniṁ gavesanto bhikkhuniyo ghaṭṭesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ purisaḥ rattim āgantvā tam bhikkhunim gavesantaḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ghaṭṭesi

original: Bhikkhuniyo taṁ bhikkhuniṁ apassantiyo evamāhaṁsu—“nissaṁsayaṁ kho sā bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṁ nikkhantā”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ tam bhikkhunim apassantiyaḥ evam āha su nissasayam kho sā bhikkhunī purisena saddhim nikkhantā ati

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassā rattiyā accayena yena tā bhikkhuniyo tenupasaṅkami. Bhikkhuniyo taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavocuṁ—“kissa tvaṁ, ayye, purisena saddhiṁ nikkhantā”ti?
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassāḥ rattiyāḥ accayena yena tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ tena upasaṅkami bhikkhuniyaḥ tam bhikkhunim etat avocuḥ tva ayye purisena saddhim nikkhantā ati
na aha ayye purisena saddhim nikkhantā ati
